displayLongName.description: An optional longer display name for supported carriers. This should align with your primary display name. Limit 32 characters (including spaces), should always start with a letter and can only contain letters, numbers, periods, commas and spaces.
displayLongName.title: Branded Calls Long Display Name

displayName.description: The display name to be shown on the terminating handset for outbound calls. The display name can be up to 15 characters (including spaces), should always start with a letter and can only contain letters, numbers, periods, commas and spaces.
displayName.title: Branded Calls Display Name

voiceIntegrityRegistrationId.description: The registration id of the associated voice integrity registration.
voiceIntegrityRegistrationId.title: Voice Integrity Registration Id

x-acceptableDocuments.description: The letter to authorize Twilio to run voice traffic on a given set of Phone Numbers.

documents.description: Letter of Authorization containing Brand Name, Tax ID, Tax country, Legal Name, Address, Phone #
